title: Word Endianness Adjuster
name: LGF_SwapBlockWord
description:
## Short description ##

Adjusts/ switches the endianness of multibyte data typed values.
For this to achieve, a loop will iterate through the array elements and swap the bytes 
intrinsically.

in/out.name: data
in/out.description: Contains the data values, which will be endianness adjusted

return_value.description: Void - Function has no return value
